verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> fought <WH3898> against Israel; <WH3478> and the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> fled <WH5127> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the Philistines, <WH6430> and fell <WH5307> slain <WH2491> on Mount <WH2022> Gilboa. <WH1533>

And the Philistines <WH6430> closely <WH1692> pursued <WH1692> Saul <WH7586> and his sons, <WH1121> and the Philistines <WH6430> struck <WH5221> down <WH5221> Jonathan, <WH3083> Abinadab <WH41> and Malchi-shua, the sons <WH1121> of Saul. <WH7586>
And the battle <WH4421> became <WH3513> heavy <WH3513> against <WH5921> Saul, <WH7586> and the archers <WH3384> <WH7198> overtook <WH4672> him; and he was wounded <WH9123> by the archers. <WH3384>

Then Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his armor <WH3627> bearer, <WH5375> "Draw <WH8025> your sword <WH2719> and thrust <WH1856> me through <WH1856> with it, lest <WH6435> these <WH428> uncircumcised <WH6189> come <WH935> and abuse <WH9412> me." But his armor <WH3627> bearer <WH5375> would <WH14> not, for he was greatly <WH3966> afraid. <WH3372> Therefore Saul <WH7586> took <WH3947> his sword <WH2719> and fell <WH5307> on it.
And when his armor <WH3627> bearer <WH5375> saw <WH7200> that Saul <WH7586> was dead, <WH4191> he likewise <WH1571> fell <WH5307> on his sword <WH2719> and died. <WH4191>
Thus Saul <WH7586> died <WH4191> with his three <WH7969> sons, <WH1121> and all <WH3605> [those] of his house <WH1004> died <WH4191> together. <WH9191>

When all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> who <WH834> were in the valley <WH6010> saw <WH7200> that they had fled, <WH5127> and that Saul <WH7586> and his sons <WH1121> were dead, <WH4191> they forsook <WH5800> their cities <WH5892> and fled; <WH5127> and the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> and lived <WH3427> in them.

And it came <WH1961> about the next <WH4283> day, <WH4283> when the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> to strip <WH6584> the slain, <WH2491> that they found <WH4672> Saul <WH7586> and his sons <WH1121> fallen <WH5307> on Mount <WH2022> Gilboa. <WH1533>

So they stripped <WH6584> him and took <WH5375> his head <WH7218> and his armor <WH3627> and sent <WH7971> [messengers] around <WH5439> the land <WH776> of the Philistines, <WH6430> to carry <WH1319> the good news <WH1319> to their idols <WH6091> and to the people. <WH5971>
And they put <WH7760> his armor <WH3627> in the house <WH1004> of their gods <WH430> and fastened <WH8628> his head <WH1538> in the house <WH1004> of Dagon. <WH1712>
When all <WH3605> Jabesh-gilead heard <WH8085> all <WH3605> that the Philistines <WH6430> had done <WH6213> to Saul, <WH7586>

all <WH3605> the valiant <WH2428> men <WH376> arose <WH6965> and took <WH5375> away the body <WH1480> of Saul <WH7586> and the bodies <WH1480> of his sons, <WH1121> and brought <WH935> them to Jabesh <WH3003> and buried <WH6912> their bones <WH6106> under <WH8478> the oak <WH424> in Jabesh, <WH3003> and fasted <WH6684> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>

So Saul <WH7586> died <WH4191> for his trespass <WH4604> which <WH834> he committed <WH4603> against the Lord, <WH3068> because <WH5921> of the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> which <WH834> he did not keep; <WH8104> and also <WH1571> because he asked <WH7592> counsel of a medium, <WH178> making <WH1875> inquiry <WH1875> [of it],
and did not inquire <WH1875> of the Lord. <WH3068> Therefore He killed <WH4191> him, and turned <WH5437> the kingdom <WH4410> to David <WH1732> the son <WH1121> of Jesse. <WH3448>
